name: Angular2-subscriber-bus-example
tagline: An example of using a subscriber bus for Angular 2 components to notify or communicate with each other.
body:
## Getting Started

1. Download or clone this repo
2. Download and install node.js: 

	https://nodejs.org/en/download/
	
3. At the project root install NPM packages

    $ npm install

## Running the project

Run the project with a browser from the project root (http://127.0.0.1:9001):

    $ grunt
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
